description: This file defines a class 'NoteSql' containing SQL schema definitions and index creation statements for the notes table in a database, including the table creation SQL and an index for ordering notes by pinned status and last updated time.

classes.name: NoteSql
classes.description: A utility class providing SQL statements related to the notes database schema.

methods.name: NoteSql._
methods.description: Private constructor to prevent instantiation, indicating this class is used as a static utility holder.

methods.name: createTable
methods.description: SQL statement for creating the notes table with specified columns and constraints.

methods.name: createPinnedUpdatedIndex
methods.description: SQL statement for creating an index to facilitate ordering of notes by pinned status and last updated timestamp.
